ComicInfo.Title: The People from Afar!; Jeweled Sceptre; The Strange Barrier!; The Girl from Way Back!
ComicInfo.Summary: Ben Harrow invents a nerve gas that turns people into mindless slaves, but he learns that a civilization of mindless slaves will not work.
